content.rendered:
Summer is the perfect time of year to get away on a relaxing cross-country road trip. Buckle up and start exploring some of the most scenic drives in the US.

Red Rock Country: Arizona

Interstate 17, which runs through Arizona, is filled with vast desert terrains and contrasting green forests. Stop along the way to visit Slide Rock State Park for gorgeous hiking trails and cliff-jumping. Keep in mind that this rocky terrain can be hard on your tires. Get your wheels checked before you head out at Aero Auto Parts. We provide and install cheap replacement auto parts in Chicago, IL to help you prepare for your trip to Arizona.

Pacific Coast Highway: California

Just over 659 miles, the Pacific Coast Highway is the longest route in California. This drive is considered one of the most beautiful in the US with breathtaking views from San Diego all the way to San Francisco. See some famous views in addition to the Pacific Ocean, like the Golden Gate Bridge and the Hearst Castle along the way.

Olympic Peninsula: Washington

Start in Seattle and drive around the Peninsula. On your journey, you’ll spot snow-capped mountains, incredible waterfalls and dazzling shorelines. However, expect the unexpected when it comes to Washington weather. Find new windshield wipers and other cheap auto parts in Chicago, IL at Aero Auto Parts.

Great River Road: Minnesota

Follow the Mississippi River from Minnesota to the Gulf of Mexico. This 3,000 miles road trip is one for the true explorers. Cutting through 10 different states, you’ll see endless scenic views and eat only the best food.
Make sure to get your car checked before any daunting road-trip. Stop at Aero Auto Parts for any cheap auto parts needed in Chicago, IL today and contact us with any questions before you begin your trip.
